scripts.dump-docs: find docs -type f | sort | while read -r file; do echo "$file"; cat "$file"; echo -e "\n"; done
scripts.dump-src: find src -type f | sort | while read -r file; do echo "$file"; cat "$file"; echo -e "\n"; done
scripts.dump-tests: find tests -type f | sort | while read -r file; do echo "$file"; cat "$file"; echo -e "\n"; done
scripts.dump-midi: find demo/midi -type f | sort | while read -r file; do echo "$file"; cat "$file"; echo -e "\n"; done
scripts.dump-demo: find demo -type f | sort | while read -r file; do echo "$file"; cat "$file"; echo -e "\n"; done
scripts.docs: documentation build src/live-loop.js src/lfo.js src/energy-manager.js src/patterns/meta-phrase-pattern.js src/patterns/contour-melody-pattern.js src/patterns/explicit-note-pattern.js src/patterns/drum-pattern.js src/patterns/syncopated-bass.js --shallow --document-exported -f md -o docs/api-temp.md && sed -E -e '/^### Table of Contents/,/^## /{ /^## /!d; }' -e '/^\[[0-9]+]: /,$d' docs/api-temp.md > docs/api.md && rm docs/api-temp.md
